content: About Rankings Campuses Chicago Events Mission President Administration Distinctions History & Timeline Accreditation & Licensure Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>About>Administration>Ben Walters Be​njamin WaltersInterim Treasurer Be​njamin Walters Interim Treasurer Ben Walter​s was appointed interim treasurer in October 2024. He oversees the University’s cash management, banking and financial service provider relationships, investments, long-term debt, insurance and environmental health and safety. The Office of the Treasurer is central to maintaining the short and long-term financial health and capital financing needs of the University. Walters joined the university as a staff member in 2003 and has served in various operational functions. Prior to being named interim treasurer, Walters was senior treasury manager, responsible for day-to-day cash operations, payment processes, debt compliance and cash flow forecasting. He received his BA and MA in history and MBA from DePaul University and is an AFP certified treasury professional.
